doc.description: Bebop Sonar driver. Reads an anlog sonar sensor and outputs sonar distance in [m]

define.name: USE_SONAR
define.description: activate use of sonar in INS extended filter (only rotorcraft)

define.name: SONAR_BEBOP_FILTER_NARROW_OBSTACLES
define.description: Do not return obstacles that are shorter than a given value

define.name: SONAR_BEBOP_FILTER_NARROW_OBSTACLES_JUMP
define.description: Sudden changes in sonar height larger than this value are neglected [unit: meters]

define.name: SONAR_BEBOP_FILTER_NARROW_OBSTACLES_TIME
define.description: Sudden changes in sonar height shorter than this value are neglected [unit: seconds]
